entry.title: Process-Tensor Tomography of SGD: Measuring Non-Markovian Memory via Back-Flow of Distinguishability

author.name: Vasileios Sevetlidis, George Pavlidis

entry.summary: Proposes viewing neural network training as a 'process tensor' and introduces back-flow of distinguishability as a witness of training memory. Demonstrates non-Markovianity in SGD training dynamics.

entry.title: Dual-Prototype Disentanglement: A Context-Aware Enhancement Framework for Time Series Forecasting

author.name: Haonan Yang, Jianchao Tang, Zhuo Li

entry.summary: Proposes DPAD, a model-agnostic framework for time series forecasting that disentangles and leverages complex temporal patterns. Uses dual-prototype bank with common and distinctive components.

entry.title: Uncertainty propagation through trained multi-layer perceptrons: Exact analytical results

author.name: Andrew Thompson, Miles McCrory

entry.summary: Provides exact analytical expressions for mean and variance of MLP output when input is multivariate Gaussian. Works for single hidden layer with ReLU activations without series expansion.

entry.title: Calibrated Similarity for Reliable Geometric Analysis of Embedding Spaces

author.name: Nicolas Tacheny

entry.summary: Uses isotonic regression to calibrate cosine similarity in embedding spaces to human judgments. Achieves near-perfect calibration while preserving rank correlation and local stability.

entry.title: Group-realizable multi-group learning by minimizing empirical risk

author.name: Navid Ardeshir, Samuel Deng, Daniel Hsu, Jingwen Liu

entry.summary: Shows sample complexity of multi-group learning improves in group-realizable setting with ERM. Also proves implementing this is computationally intractable when group class has infinite VC dimension.

entry.title: Distributional Computational Graphs: Error Bounds

author.name: Olof Hallqvist Elias, Michael Selby, Phillip Stanley-Marbell

entry.summary: Establishes non-asymptotic Wasserstein-1 error bounds for distributional computational graphs where inputs are probability distributions. Applies to empirical distributions and finite approximations.

entry.title: Perfect Clustering for Sparse Directed Stochastic Block Models

author.name: Behzad Aalipur, Yichen Qin

entry.summary: Proposes non-spectral method for community detection in sparse directed stochastic block models. Uses neighborhood-smoothing followed by K-means, working when number of communities grows.

entry.title: Neurocomputational Mechanisms of Syntactic Transfer in Bilingual Sentence Production

author.name: Ahmet Yavuz Uluslu, Elliot Murphy

entry.summary: Discusses incorporating oscillatory neural signatures into study of bilingual production errors, proposing ROSE model can account for syntactic transfer and cross-linguistic influence.

entry.title: Hybrid Deep Feature Extraction and ML for Construction and Demolition Debris Classification

author.name: Obai Alashram, Nejad Alagha, Mahmoud AlKakuri, Zeeshan Swaveel, Abigail Copiaco

entry.summary: Presents hybrid pipeline using deep feature extraction (Xception) with classical ML classifiers for construction debris classification on novel UAE dataset of 1,800 images across 4 material categories.

entry.title: GlassesGB: Controllable 2D GAN-Based Eyewear Personalization for 3D Gaussian Blendshapes Head Avatars

author.name: Rui-Yang Ju, Jen-Shiun Chiang

entry.summary: Proposes GlassesGB framework for customizable eyewear generation on 3D head avatars, bridging 2D GAN-based eyewear design with 3D Gaussian Blendshapes head reconstruction.

entry.title: Quantifying Ergonomics in the Elevate Soft Robotic Suit

author.name: Peter Bryan, Rejin John Varghese, Dario Farina

entry.summary: Presents quantitative evaluation of ergonomics and comfort for the Elevate cable-driven soft robotic suit for shoulder elevation assistance.

entry.title: Uni-RS: A Spatially Faithful Unified Understanding and Generation Model for Remote Sensing

author.name: Weiyu Zhang, Yuan Hu, Yong Li, Yu Liu

entry.summary: Uni-RS addresses spatial asymmetry in remote sensing multimodal models through explicit spatial-layout planning and spatial-aware query injection.

entry.title: Private Accountability in the Age of Artificial Intelligence

author.name: Sonia Katyal

entry.summary: Legal/academic analysis exploring conflicts between AI and civil rights protection, arguing for focus on technology-property-civil rights interactions rather than algorithmic accountability alone.

entry.title: Arabic Sign Language Recognition using Multimodal Approach

author.name: Ghadeer Alanazi, Abir Benabid

entry.summary: Investigates multimodal approach combining Leap Motion and RGB camera data for Arabic Sign Language recognition using custom dense neural networks with dropout and L2 regularization.

entry.title: LoD Sketch Extraction from Architectural Models Using Generative AI: Dataset Construction for Multi-Level Architectural Design Generation

author.name: Xusheng Du, Athiwat Kongkaeo, Ye Zhang, Haoran Xie

entry.summary: Proposes automatic LoD sketch extraction framework using generative AI for multi-level architectural design, addressing lack of paired training data for LoD modeling.

entry.title: Federated Proximal Optimization for Privacy-Preserving Heart Disease Prediction: A Controlled Simulation Study on Non-IID Clinical Data

author.name: Farzam Asad, Junaid Saif Khan, Maria Tariq, Sundus Munir, Muhammad Adnan Khan

entry.summary: Simulation study of FedProx for heart disease prediction on non-IID clinical data using UCI Heart Disease dataset. Addresses privacy constraints in healthcare.

entry.title: Feature-Space Generative Models for One-Shot Class-Incremental Learning

author.name: Jack Foster, Kirill Paramonov, Mete Ozay, Umberto Michieli

entry.summary: Uses feature-space generative models for one-shot class-incremental learning by mapping embeddings to residual space and learning prototypes.

entry.title: Design Techniques for LLM-Powered Interactive Storytelling: A Case Study of the Dramamancer System

author.name: Tiffany Wang, Yuqian Sun, Yi Wang, Melissa Roemmele, John Joon Young Chung, Max Kreminski

entry.summary: Extended abstract outlining design techniques for LLM-powered interactive storytelling in Dramamancer system, bridging authorial intent and player agency through story schemas.

entry.title: Hylog: A Hybrid Approach to Logging Text Production in Non-alphabetic Scripts

author.name: Roberto Crotti, Giovanni Denaro, Zhiqiang Du, Ricardo Mu\~noz Mart\'in

entry.summary: Presents Hylog, a hybrid logging system combining analytical keylogging with ecological text logging to capture Input Method Editor transformations for non-alphabetic scripts like Chinese.

entry.title: Designing large language model prompts to extract scores from messy text: A shared dataset and challenge

author.name: Mike Thelwall

entry.summary: Introduces dataset and challenge for designing LLM prompts to extract research quality scores from messy text, providing benchmark for NLP extraction tasks.

entry.title: Quran-MD: A Fine-Grained Multilingual Multimodal Dataset of the Quran

author.name: Muhammad Umar Salman, Mohammad Areeb Qazi, Mohammed Talha Alam

entry.summary: Presents Quran-MD, a comprehensive multimodal dataset integrating textual, linguistic, and audio dimensions of the Quran at verse and word levels, including recordings from 32 reciters.

entry.title: Revisiting Aerial Scene Classification on the AID Benchmark

author.name: Subhajeet Das, Susmita Ghosh, Abhiroop Chatterjee

entry.summary: Surveys aerial scene classification methods from handcrafted features to deep hybrid networks, and proposes Aerial-Y-Net with spatial attention and multi-scale feature fusion.

entry.title: Comparative Evaluation of Machine Learning Algorithms for Affective State Recognition from Children's Drawings

author.name: Aura Loredana Dan

entry.summary: Compares deep learning architectures (MobileNet, EfficientNet, VGG16) for affective state recognition from children's drawings for autism assessment.

entry.title: ME-WARD: A multimodal ergonomic analysis tool for musculoskeletal risk assessment from inertial and video data in working plac

author.name: Javier Gonz\'alez-Alonso, Paula Mart\'in-Tapia, David Gonz\'alez-Ortega, M\'iriam Ant\'on-Rodr\'iguez, Francisco Javier D\'iaz-Pernas, Mario Mart\'inez-Zarzuela

entry.summary: Presents ME-WARD, a multimodal ergonomic assessment tool implementing RULA methodology using IMU-based motion capture and deep learning pose tracking.

entry.title: No silver bullet: Lessons about how to create safety from the history of fire

author.name: jasoncrawford

entry.summary: Historical analysis of fire safety development arguing that safety is achieved through 'defense in depth' and multiple coordinated solutions, not silver bullets. Uses this as an analogy for thinking about AI safety approaches.

entry.title: Futarchy is Parasitic on What It Tries to Govern

author.name: Nicolas Rasmont

entry.summary: Argues futarchy (governance by prediction markets) fails structurally because conditional decision markets cannot estimate causal policy effects once acted upon. Traders price welfare conditional on approval rather than caused by approval.

entry.title: Credit Fairness: Online Fairness In Shared Resource Pools

author.name: Seyed Majid Zahedi, Rupert Freeman

entry.summary: Credit Fairness addresses online fairness in shared resource allocation, showing max-min mechanism leads to large disparities over time.

entry.title: Autonomous Mars Rover Module for Soil Sampling and Life Component Analysis

author.name: Bibek Adhikari, Rishab Rijal, Rakesh Yadav, Nikchey Khatri, Sandesh Dhakal

entry.summary: Proposes autonomous Mars rover module for soil sampling and biochemical testing using multidisciplinary integration of mechanical and vision systems.

entry.title: Grammar-Aware Literate Generative Mathematical Programming with Compiler-in-the-Loop

author.name: Roberto Rossi, Steven D. Prestwich

entry.summary: SyntAGM translates natural language to PyOPL mathematical models via generate-compile-assess-revise loop with grammar awareness.

entry.title: HyCARD-Net: A Synergistic Hybrid Intelligence Framework for Cardiovascular Disease Diagnosis

author.name: Rajan Das Gupta, Xiaobin Wu, Xun Liu, Jiaqi He

entry.summary: Proposes HyCARD-Net combining CNNs, LSTMs with KNN and XGBoost via ensemble voting for cardiovascular disease diagnosis, achieving high accuracy on benchmark datasets.

entry.title: Investigating Self-regulated Learning Sequences within a Generative AI-based Intelligent Tutoring System

author.name: Jie Gao, Shasha Li, Jianhua Zhang, Shan Li, Tingting Wang

entry.summary: Studies self-regulated learning patterns in GenAI-assisted tutoring systems by analyzing student interaction traces and information processing behaviors. Uses sequential and clustering analysis to identify learning patterns.

entry.title: AI-based System for Transforming text and sound to Educational Videos

author.name: M. E. ElAlami, S. M. Khater, M. El. R. Rehan

entry.summary: Proposes a GAN-based system for converting text or speech inputs into educational videos through three phases: transcription, keyword extraction, and frame-by-frame video generation.

entry.title: SiMiC: Context-Aware Silicon Microstructure Characterization Using Attention-Based Convolutional Neural Networks for Field-Emission Tip Analysis

author.name: Jing Jie Tan, Rupert Schreiner, Matthias Hausladen, Ali Asgharzade, Simon Edler, Julian Bartsch, Michael Bachmann, Andreas Schels, Ban-Hoe Kwan, Danny Wee-Kiat Ng, Yan-Chai Hum

entry.summary: Proposes SiMiC, an attention-based CNN for characterizing silicon microstructures from SEM images, automatically extracting morphological features like size, shape, and apex curvature.

entry.title: Trademark Search, Artificial Intelligence and the Role of the Private Sector

author.name: Sonia Katyal, Aniket Kesari

entry.summary: Examines AI's role in trademark search and similarity analysis, highlighting implications for lawyers and scholars as AI transforms intellectual property practices.

entry.title: CUROCKET: Optimizing ROCKET for GPU

author.name: Ole St\"uven, Keno Moenck, Thorsten Sch\"uppstuhl

entry.summary: Optimizes ROCKET time series classification algorithm for GPU execution with CuPy implementation. Enables convolution acceleration on GPU hardware.

entry.title: FinMetaMind: A Tech Blueprint on NLQ Systems for Financial Knowledge Search

author.name: Lalit Pant, Shivang Nagar

entry.summary: Technical blueprint for NLQ system for financial knowledge search addressing relevance ranking, data freshness, and entity recognition using NLP and vector data models.

entry.title: Do readers prefer AI-generated Italian short stories?

author.name: Michael Farrell

entry.summary: User study investigating reader preferences for AI-generated Italian short stories vs human author. Found AI texts received slightly higher ratings but no significant demographic associations.

entry.title: FedCCA: Client-Centric Adaptation against Data Heterogeneity in Federated Learning on IoT Devices

author.name: Kaile Wang, Jiannong Cao, Yu Yang, Xiaoyin Li, Yinfeng Cao

entry.summary: FedCCA addresses data heterogeneity in federated learning on IoT through client-centric adaptation extracting client-specific knowledge.

entry.title: From Fuzzy to Exact: The Halo Architecture for Infinite-Depth Reasoning via Rational Arithmetic

author.name: Hansheng Ren

entry.summary: Proposes 'Exactness Hypothesis' claiming AGI requires arbitrary precision arithmetic, and introduces Halo Architecture using rational arithmetic to address LLM hallucinations attributed to floating-point errors.

entry.title: Efficient Gaussian process learning via subspace projections

author.name: Felipe Tobar, Elsa Cazelles

entry.summary: Proposes 'projected likelihood' for Gaussian Process training using lower-dimensional data projections, providing closed-form expressions for information loss. Shows improvements over exact GP training and variational sparse GPs in accuracy and computational efficiency.

entry.title: kNN-Graph: An adaptive graph model for $k$-nearest neighbors

author.name: Jiaye Li, Gang Chen, Hang Xu, Shichao Zhang

entry.summary: Proposes adaptive graph model for k-nearest neighbors that integrates HNSW graphs with pre-computed voting. Decouples inference latency from computational complexity by shifting neighbor selection to preprocessing.

entry.title: A Collision-Free Hot-Tier Extension for Engram-Style Conditional Memory: A Controlled Study of Training Dynamics

author.name: Tao Lin

entry.summary: Investigates whether high-frequency key collisions bottleneck Engram-style conditional memory. Introduces collision-free hot-tier extension but finds it doesn't consistently improve validation loss.

entry.title: Predicting Startup Success Using Large Language Models: A Novel In-Context Learning Approach

author.name: Abdurahman Maarouf, Alket Bakiaj, Stefan Feuerriegel

entry.summary: Uses in-context learning with LLMs for startup success prediction without model training. Proposes k-NN based example selection for demonstrations when labeled data is scarce.

entry.title: Integrating Meteorological and Operational Data: A Novel Approach to Understanding Railway Delays in Finland

author.name: Vinicius Pozzobon Borin, Jean Michel de Souza Sant'Ana, Usama Raheel, Nurul Huda Mahmood

entry.summary: Presents first public dataset combining Finnish railway operations with synchronized meteorological observations 2018-2024. Integrates data from 209 weather stations with 28 engineered features.

entry.title: Sample-wise Constrained Learning via a Sequential Penalty Approach with Applications in Image Processing

author.name: Francesca Lanzillotta, Chiara Albisani, Davide Pucci, Daniele Baracchi, Alessandro Piva, Matteo Lapucci

entry.summary: Shows sample-wise constraints in learning should be enforced via sequential penalty methods rather than arbitrary penalties. Proves convergence guarantees and demonstrates viability in image processing.

entry.title: Calibrated Probabilistic Interpolation for GEDI Biomass

author.name: Robin Young, Srinivasan Keshav

entry.summary: Uses Attentive Neural Processes for interpolating sparse GEDI LiDAR observations for biomass mapping. Shows RF and XGBoost fail to produce calibrated prediction intervals; ANPs provide calibrated uncertainty.

entry.title: Latent Diffusion for Internet of Things Attack Data Generation in Intrusion Detection

author.name: Estela S\'anchez-Carballo, Francisco M. Melgarejo-Meseguer, Jos\'e Luis Rojo-\'Alvarez

entry.summary: Proposes Latent Diffusion Model for IoT intrusion detection data augmentation. Addresses class imbalance between benign and attack traffic in ML-based intrusion detection systems.

entry.title: Active learning for photonics

author.name: Ryan Lopez, Charlotte Loh, Rumen Dangovski, Marin Solja\v{c}i\'c

entry.summary: Uses analytic last-layer Bayesian neural networks for active learning in photonic crystal band gap prediction. Achieves 2.6x reduction in required training data through uncertainty-driven sample selection.

entry.title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Energy-Aware Coverage Path Planning for Precision Agriculture

author.name: Beining Wu, Zihao Ding, Leo Ostigaard, Jun Huang

entry.summary: Proposes energy-aware coverage path planning for agricultural robots using Soft Actor-Critic RL. Integrates CNNs and LSTMs for spatial-temporal decision-making with energy constraints.

entry.title: Kernel smoothing on manifolds

entry.title: Research Summary: January 26, 2026

author.name: AATF AI News Aggregator

entry.summary:
Today's research features a major open-source release and critical safety findings. LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601, a 560B MoE reasoning model, achieves SOTA among open-source models for agentic tasks. VibeTensor demonstrates LLM agents can generate complete deep learning system software stacks including CUDA runtime.

  • Endless Terminals (Stanford/UW) introduces autonomous pipeline for generating terminal RL environments, addressing a key bottleneck for self-improving agents
  • PHISH framework reveals persona jailbreaking via adversarial conversation history, bypassing input-only safety filters
  • Timely Machine reframes test-time scaling as wall-clock time, finding smaller models often outperform larger ones under time constraints

Theoretical and interpretability advances include floating-point transformer expressivity analysis proving non-equivariant function representation without positional encoding. Sycophancy signals are shown to be linearly separable in middle-layer attention heads, enabling targeted steering. A conceptual critique of machine unlearning argues dual-use capabilities and compositional generalization fundamentally prevent knowledge removal—an important insight for AI safety policy.
